title: MTGGoldfish

Monday: Budget Magic, MTGGoldfish Podcast

Wednesday: Against the Odds

Friday: Much Abrew About Nothing
Saturday: Arena Series with Crim

videos.author: MTGGoldfish
videos.title: Just How Busted is Radiant Lotus, Actually?  Against the Odds
videos.description:
Is Radiant Lotus busted? What are the odd of winning with it (and Boommobile) in Aetherdrift Standard? Let's find out!

Today's video is brought to you by Card Kingdom. You can pick up some  Magic: the Gathering cards (and help support the show) at https://www.cardkingdom.com/mtggoldfish

► Read more about this deck (full article): https://www.mtggoldfish.com/articles/against-the-odds-haunted-lotus-standard
► View this deck with the latest prices: https://www.mtggoldfish.com/deck/6905391#paper

◼ Purchase this deck (paper): http://mtg.fish/3PtIp
◼ Purchase this deck (Magic Online): http://mtg.fish/mUKys
